name: AVOIDA
description:
♦ Easy to learn, hard to master! Game about avoiding some crazy triangles! ♦ 


○ Do your best by controlling a ball and collecting points! ○ 


○ Awesome skins: 
○ 14 COMMON
○ 5 RARE
○ 2 EPIC skins!


You can use points to buy:

► new cool looking balls,

► new super-great modes!


Features:

►Addictive gameplay,

►Relaxing music,

►A lot hidden stuff waiting for you to discover!


▲▲ A work of 2 high-school students! ▲▲


▲▲▲Let's see if you can beat this game!▲▲▲


★ AVOID it! ★
